data.name: BodyConfirmPasswordReset
data.value:
Dear {0},
Your password has been changed. Questions? Contact Info@EvaluationEngine.org.
Thank you for participating in Evaluation Engine.

data.name: BodyNewAccount
data.value:
Dear {0},
An Evaluation Engine account has been created for you. Please click the link below to create a password.
{1}
Questions? Contact Info@EvaluationEngine.org.

data.name: BodyPasswordResetRequest
data.value:
Dear {0},
Please click the link below to change your password. This link will expire in {1} hours.
{2}
Questions? Contact Info@EvaluationEngine.org.
Thank you for participating in Evaluation Engine.

data.name: ChooseAtLeastOneState
data.value: Please select at least one state.|FAILURE

data.name: ConfirmPasswordResetRequest
data.value: A password reset link has been sent to your email address. Please check your email and follow the instructions to reset your password.|SUCCESS

data.name: ExpiredPassword
data.value: Your password has expired. Please change it.|FAILURE

data.name: ExpiredPasswordResetUrl
data.value: This reset password URL has expired. Please log in or click Reset Password again.|FAILURE

data.name: FaultyClientData
data.value: There was an error with the data you entered.|FAILURE

data.name: FaultyPasswordResetToken
data.value: The token provided is not valid. Please try clicking the link in the email again.|FAILURE

data.name: FileNotSubmitted
data.value: Please upload a file. It could be possible the one you submitted has no content.

data.name: FolderDeletedSuccessfully
data.value: The folder was successfully deleted.|SUCCESS

data.name: InvalidCredentials
data.value: The email or password provided is incorrect.|FAILURE

data.name: LockedAccount
data.value: Your account has been locked. Please wait 10 minutes before trying to log in again.|FAILURE

data.name: OnlyOnePasswordResetPerDay
data.value: Passwords may only be reset once a day.|FAILURE

data.name: PasswordAboutToExpire
data.value: Please consider changing your password soon. It will expire in {0} day(s).|FAILURE

data.name: PasswordInHistory
data.value: You have already used that password in the recent past. Please pick another.|FAILURE

data.name: PasswordIsValid
data.value: Password passed additional validation checks.

data.name: PasswordsTooSimilar
data.value: The new password is too similar to the old password.|FAILURE

data.name: PasswordUpdateSuccess
data.value: Your password was successfully updated.|SUCCESS

data.name: SomethingWentWrong
data.value: Something went wrong! We'll look into the problem.|FAILURE

data.name: SubjectConfirmPasswordReset
data.value: Evaluation Engine—Password was successfully reset

data.name: SubjectNewAccount
data.value: Evaluation Engine—Account Created

data.name: SubjectPasswordResetRequest
data.value: Evaluation Engine—Password Change Request

data.name: SuccessNewAccountVerification
data.value: You have successfully updated your password.|SUCCESS

data.name: UserAccountCreatedSuccessfully
data.value: The account for the user was created successfully. The user should receive a confirmation email soon.|SUCCESS

data.name: UserAddError
data.value: We encountered an error while creating this account. Please ensure you entered all the fields, and that the user you are trying to create does not already exist in the system.|FAILURE

data.name: UserDeleteFail
data.value: The user could not be removed.|FAILURE

data.name: UserDeleteSuccess
data.value: The user was successfully removed.|SUCCESS

data.name: UserUpdateFail
data.value: The user account could not be updated.|FAILURE

data.name: UserUpdateFailEmailAddressInUse
data.value: Another user is using that email address.|FAILURE

data.name: UserUpdateFailInvalidData
data.value: You entered incorrectly one or more fields.|FAILURE

data.name: UserUpdateFailNoAction
data.value: We don't know exactly how you would like to edit this user.|FAILRUE

data.name: UserUpdateFailUserDoesNotExist
data.value: The user you attempted to edit does not exist.|FAILURE

data.name: UserUpdateSuccess
data.value: The user account was successfully updated.|SUCCESS

data.name: NotAuthorizedInSiteSection
data.value: You are not authorized to use this section of the site.|FAILURE

data.name: AlreadyConfirmed
data.value: You have already confirmed your email address... please log in.|FAILURE

data.name: PasswordResetFail
data.value: There was an error with the data you entered.|FAILURE

data.name: PasswordResetNotValid
data.value: The user account is not valid. Please try clicking the link in your email again.|FAILURE

data.name: PasswordUpdateFail
data.value: The current password is incorrect or the new password is invalid.|FAILURE
